entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 4:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
